com.kolbly.android.util.time
Class SystemTimeFormat

java.lang.Object
  com.kolbly.android.util.time.SystemTimeFormat

public final class SystemTimeFormat
extends java.lang.Object

Android system settings utility class. Optionally, can be registered to listen for settings changes and will reset its values so that the most recent settings are used. The default is to read and store each setting value only on its first use.

Author:
mkolbly
